mapper.sql: SELECT m.id, m.group_id, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(m.username, 1, 3), '****', SUBSTRING(m.username, 8)) AS username, m.nickname, -- m.PASSWORD, -- m.salt, -- m.salt_code, m.email, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(m.mobile, 1, 3), '****', SUBSTRING(m.mobile, 8)) AS mobile, m.avatar, m.LEVEL, m.gender, m.bio, m.qq, m.money, m.score, m.successions, m.max_successions, m.prev_time, m.login_time, m.login_ip, m.login_failure, m.login_failure_code, m.payment_code, m.join_ip, m.join_time, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.token, m.STATUS, m.verification, m.property_money, m.balance, m.position_money, m.freeze_money, m.all_earnings_rate, m.transaction_num, m.yesterday_profit, m.city_value, m.superior_name, m.superior_code, m.superior_id, m.institution_number, m.is_simulation, m.position, m.delay_money, m.sg_freeze_money, m.daili_id, m.jingzhijiaoyi, m.is_pz, m.is_dz, m.is_ps, m.is_sg, m.is_zs, m.is_qc, m.is_qh, m.is_vip, m.is_inform, m.freeze_profit, m.zxyz, m.weiyima, m.NAME, m.id_card, m.id_card_front_image, m.id_card_back_image, m.submit_auth_time, m.auth_time, m.is_auth, m.auth_reject_reason, m.auth_reject_time, m.deposit_bank, m.khzhihang, m.account_name, m.account, m.card_image, m.is_default, m.account_type, m.binding_time, m.unbind_time, m.delete_flag, m.bank_card_auth, m.balance_spot, m.freeze_profit_spot, m.balance_contract, m.freeze_profit_contract, m.balance_financing, m.freeze_profit_financing FROM fa_member m
mapper.select: where m.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into fa_member
group_id, username, nickname, password, salt, salt_code, email, mobile, avatar, level, gender, bio, qq, money, score, successions, max_successions, prev_time, login_time, login_ip, login_failure, login_failure_code, payment_code, join_ip, join_time, create_time, update_time, token, status, verification, property_money, balance, position_money, freeze_money, all_earnings_rate, transaction_num, yesterday_profit, city_value, superior_name, superior_code, superior_id, institution_number, is_simulation, position, delay_money, sg_freeze_money, daili_id, jingzhijiaoyi, is_pz, is_dz, is_ps, is_sg, is_zs, is_qc, is_qh, is_vip, is_inform, freeze_profit, zxyz, weiyima, name, id_card, id_card_front_image, id_card_back_image, submit_auth_time, auth_time, is_auth, auth_reject_reason, auth_reject_time, deposit_bank, khzhihang, account_name, account, card_image, is_default, account_type, binding_time, unbind_time, delete_flag, bank_card_auth, balance_spot, freeze_profit_spot, balance_contract, freeze_profit_contract, balance_financing, freeze_profit_financing,
#{groupId}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{saltCode}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{avatar}, #{level}, #{gender}, #{bio}, #{qq}, #{money}, #{score}, #{successions}, #{maxSuccessions}, #{prevTime}, #{loginTime}, #{loginIp}, #{loginFailure}, #{loginFailureCode}, #{paymentCode}, #{joinIp}, #{joinTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{token}, #{status}, #{verification}, #{propertyMoney}, #{balance}, #{positionMoney}, #{freezeMoney}, #{allEarningsRate}, #{transactionNum}, #{yesterdayProfit}, #{cityValue}, #{superiorName}, #{superiorCode}, #{superiorId}, #{institutionNumber}, #{isSimulation}, #{position}, #{delayMoney}, #{sgFreezeMoney}, #{dailiId}, #{jingzhijiaoyi}, #{isPz}, #{isDz}, #{isPs}, #{isSg}, #{isZs}, #{isQc}, #{isQh}, #{isVip}, #{isInform}, #{freezeProfit}, #{zxyz}, #{weiyima}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{idCardFrontImage}, #{idCardBackImage}, #{submitAuthTime}, #{authTime}, #{isAuth}, #{authRejectReason}, #{authRejectTime}, #{depositBank}, #{khzhihang}, #{accountName}, #{account}, #{cardImage}, #{isDefault}, #{accountType}, #{bindingTime}, #{unbindTime}, #{deleteFlag}, #{bankCardAuth}, #{balanceSpot}, #{freezeProfitSpot}, #{balanceContract}, #{freezeProfitContract}, #{balanceFinancing}, #{freezeProfitFinancing},
mapper.delete: update fa_member set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}

update fa_member set delete_flag = 1 where id in
#{id}

update fa_member set name = null, id_card = null, id_card_front_image = null, id_card_back_image = null, submit_auth_time = null, auth_time = null, is_auth = 0, auth_reject_reason = null, auth_reject_time = null where id in
#{id}

update fa_member set deposit_bank = null, account_name = null, account = null, binding_time = null, unbind_time = null, bank_card_auth = 0 where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE( SUM( shd.hold_number * s.cai_trade ), 0) FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd LEFT JOIN fa_strategy s ON shd.stock_id = s.id WHERE shd.member_id = #{id} AND shd.`status` = 0 AND shd.delete_flag = 0

SELECT COALESCE( SUM( shd.hold_number * s.cai_trade ), 0) FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd LEFT JOIN fa_strategy s ON shd.stock_id = s.id WHERE shd.member_id = #{id} AND shd.`status` = 0 AND shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.is_list = 1

SELECT COALESCE( SUM( shd.hold_number * ns.fx_price ), 0) FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd LEFT JOIN fa_new_stock ns ON shd.new_stock_id = ns.id WHERE shd.member_id = #{id} AND shd.`status` = 0 AND shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.is_list = 0
SELECT COALESCE( SUM( r.money ), 0 ) FROM fa_recharge r WHERE r.is_pay = 1 AND r.delete_flag = 0 AND r.user_id = #{id}
SELECT COALESCE( SUM( w.money ), 0 ) FROM fa_withdraw w WHERE w.is_pay in (0, 1) AND w.delete_flag = 0 AND w.user_id = #{id}
SELECT COALESCE( SUM( ss.zq_money ), 0 ) FROM fa_stock_sg ss WHERE ss.delete_flag = 0 AND ss.`status` = 1 AND ss.renjiao = 1 AND ss.is_cc = 0 AND ss.user_id = #{id}

SELECT COALESCE( SUM( CASE WHEN ps.is_tz = 0 THEN ps.money WHEN ps.is_tz = 1 THEN ps.zq_money END ), 0 ) FROM fa_stock_ps ps WHERE ps.delete_flag = 0 AND ps.`status` in (0,1) AND ps.renjiao = 1 AND ps.is_cc = 0 AND ps.user_id = #{id}

SELECT COALESCE( SUM( shd.hold_number * ( CAST( s.cai_trade AS DECIMAL ( 10, 2 )) - shd.average )), 0 ) FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd LEFT JOIN fa_strategy s ON shd.stock_id = s.id WHERE shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.`status` = 0 AND shd.member_id = #{id}
SELECT COALESCE( SUM( shd.profit_lose ), 0 ) FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd WHERE shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.`status` = 1 AND shd.member_id = #{id}

SELECT COALESCE ( sum( h.hold_number * s.cai_trade ), 0 ) listedHold FROM fa_member m LEFT JOIN fa_stock_hold_detail h ON m.id = h.member_id LEFT JOIN fa_strategy s ON h.stock_id = s.id WHERE m.id = #{id} AND h.STATUS = 0 AND h.is_list = 1

SELECT COALESCE ( sum( h.hold_number * ns.fx_price ), 0 ) unlistedHold FROM fa_member m LEFT JOIN fa_stock_hold_detail h ON m.id = h.member_id LEFT JOIN fa_new_stock ns ON h.new_stock_id = ns.id WHERE m.id = #{id} AND h.STATUS = 0 AND h.is_list = 0
SELECT COALESCE ( sum( sg.zq_nums * sg.sg_fx_price ), 0 ) newStockSg FROM fa_member m LEFT JOIN fa_stock_sg sg ON m.id = sg.user_id WHERE m.id = #{id} AND sg.is_cc = 0
SELECT COALESCE ( sum( ps.money ), 0 ) newStockPs FROM fa_member m LEFT JOIN fa_stock_ps ps ON m.id = ps.user_id WHERE m.id = #{id} AND ps.`status` in (0,1) AND ps.renjiao = 1 AND ps.is_cc = 0
SELECT COALESCE ( sum( r.money ), 0 ) recharge FROM fa_recharge r WHERE r.user_id = #{id} AND r.is_pay = 1 AND r.delete_flag = 0
SELECT COALESCE ( sum( w.money ), 0 ) withdraw FROM fa_withdraw w WHERE w.user_id = #{id} AND w.is_pay in (0, 1) AND w.delete_flag = 0

SELECT COALESCE( SUM( shd.hold_number * s.cai_trade ), 0) FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd LEFT JOIN fa_strategy s ON shd.stock_id = s.id WHERE shd.member_id = #{id} AND shd.`status` = 0 AND shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.is_list = 1 AND shd.hold_type = 2

SELECT COALESCE( SUM( shd.hold_number * ( CAST( s.cai_trade AS DECIMAL ( 10, 2 )) - shd.average )), 0 ) FROM fa_stock_hold_detail shd LEFT JOIN fa_strategy s ON shd.stock_id = s.id WHERE shd.delete_flag = 0 AND shd.`status` = 0 AND shd.member_id = #{id} AND shd.hold_type = 2
SELECT COALESCE( SUM( st.trading_poundage + st.stamp_duty ), 0 ) FROM fa_stock_trading st WHERE st.delete_flag = 0 AND st.member_id = #{id}
